edge: Sarman grew up in the village near Mohenjo Daro and has a strong connection to the city, as evidenced by his dreams and uncle's amulet.
Sarman and Hojo are friends who attempt to sneak away from Sarman's village to Mohenjo Daro, but are caught by his uncle.
Sarman's uncle initially refuses to allow him to go to Mohenjo Daro, but eventually relents.
Maham is the ruler of Mohenjo Daro and is attempting to impose additional taxes on the farmers, which Sarman leads the farmers to oppose.
Sarman is enchanted by Chaani's beauty and charm when he meets her in Mohenjo Daro.
